title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Jake Quickenden's Woody charmed into dangerous action by Cindy?
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Builder Woody (Jake Quickenden) arrives in Hollyoaks during the coming episodes with a very important job to do for Cindy Cunningham (Stephanie Waring). Cindy wastes little time in charming him — but will she persuade him into taking some dangerous action?

Several weeks back, Cindy made clear her intentions to take over the village once more with her ‘Grande Bizarre’, and — with both Luke (Gary Lucy) and Tom (Ellis Hollins) involved — she sets about getting work underway in the coming episodes.

She’s so eager to get to work on the project that she’s hired her own builder, Woody, and Tom’s less than pleased when she introduces them to one another, as it becomes apparent that she only hired him based on his looks.

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Meanwhile, Charlie discovers the entrance to the village’s underground tunnels — and he’s incredibly excited to investigate further.

Advertisement

Advertisement

However, upon doing so, he’s forced to hide, as he stumbles upon Woody and Cindy in the middle of a conversation.

As the two chat, it becomes clear that Cindy wants to skip the rules and regulations and start the build straight away.

Will Cindy’s charms be enough to win Woody over in this respect?

Apparently so, as — later in the week — Tom discovers that Cindy’s already paid Woody a whopping £30,000!

Will the dangerous plan go ahead? Or will Tom cop on that this money is a bribe and thus put a stop to it before someone’s hurt?

One to watch: Wednesday 23rd October at 7pm on E4.
